title: Mouse sometimes ignores right clicks and/or freezes
body:
Hi,

For some reason, both of my mouses seem to ignore like 25% of right clicks. Also, they randomly freeze for like 1s, making it extremely unpleasant when I'm trying to drag the map up/down.

Any tips what it could be? I'm playing on a PC and ONLy when League is running.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: What is freezing exactly, your cursor or the game itself?  If your mouse is not receiving your input, there could be a problem with it.  Do you have any other mouse you would be able to test in order to rule out some possibilities?  This can help pinpoint where the issue is.  If you are still having problems, let me know and with more detail of what is happening exactly.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=x7Ou8Mjy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-07T15:41:50.864+0000)
>
> What is freezing exactly, your cursor or the game itself?  If your mouse is not receiving your input, there could be a problem with it.  Do you have any other mouse you would be able to test in order to rule out some possibilities?  This can help pinpoint where the issue is.  If you are still having problems, let me know and with more detail of what is happening exactly.

The cursor would freeze, or more exactly, wouldn't react - the game would would not feel a thing and keep going meanwhile.

PS. Thanks for trying, but it seems that I found the issue on my own. I tried one more mouse, non-logitech, and it works fine. I'm not sure if the drivers were conflicting or both mouses that I tried previously were faulty (somewhat unlikely, as both are different models, from different sources and one is brand new), but as long as I know what's the issue, buying a new mouse and putting the two as spares isn't a big deal.
